TopicTitle: assign hotkey to a GUI button

Articles.Content:
Hi fellow KSP players, 

I'm trying to find a way to assign keys on the my keyboard to control the SAS, 

for exemple, i'd like to assign a key to select the PROGRADE, and an other one for RETROGRADE, so i dont need to use my mouse to click on the GUI button on the left of the navball.

Is there a mod out there that does that ??

Is there a third party software that can link an area of my screen with a hotkey ???

 

Did anybody did that before ? any suggestion ??

 

Thanks a lot in advance

 

Chris
Was about to post about this. Is there a way now?

Hey mate, 

Check ControllerMate....

Does the job perfectly. You assign a key to a screen coordinate...

you can even have keys to toggle some mods like the dock alignement indicator or infos form redux

Have fun
